languages.text: "Обычно с таких безмятежных ремарок и начинаются крупные неприятности. Оставайтесь начеку".

traits.locale_text: "Обычно с таких безмятежных ремарок и начинаются крупные неприятности. Оставайтесь начеку"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
languages.original_text: "Обычно с таких безмятежных ремарок и начинаются крупные неприятности. Оставайтесь начеку".

traits.locale_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “是吗，既然你这么说的话，那我猜情况随时都有可能会急转直下。要保持警惕。”
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: “是吗，既然你这么说的话，那我猜情况随时都有可能会急转直下。要保持警惕。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, ahora que ha dicho eso, confío en que las cosas irán a peor en los próximos momentos. Todos alerta».
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ahora que ha dicho eso, confío en que las cosas irán a peor en los próximos momentos. Todos alerta».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ、あなたがそういうのなら、事態が今にも悪化するかもしれないな。油断は禁物だ」
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ、あなたがそういうのなら、事態が今にも悪化するかもしれないな。油断は禁物だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tja, nachdem Ihr das jetzt gesagt habt, werden sich die Geschehnisse wohl gleich überschlagen. Haltet die Augen offen."
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: "Tja, nachdem Ihr das jetzt gesagt habt, werden sich die Geschehnisse wohl gleich überschlagen. Haltet die Augen offen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Maintenant que vous le dites, j'imagine que ça va dégénérer d'un moment à l'autre. Restez sur vos gardes. »
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que vous le dites, j'imagine que ça va dégénérer d'un moment à l'autre. Restez sur vos gardes. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdi sen öyle deyince her şeyin her an ters gidebileceği hissine kapıldım. Temkinli olun."
languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi sen öyle deyince her şeyin her an ters gidebileceği hissine kapıldım. Temkinli olun."

languages.original_text: "Well, now you've said that, I expect things to take a turn for the worse any minute now. Be on your guard."
